item.title: 芝加哥大学商学院获得 1 亿美元捐赠
item.description: 私募股权投资人康斯坦丁-索科洛夫（Konstantin Sokolov）向芝加哥大学布斯商学院捐赠了 1 亿美元，在美国名校面临失去数十亿美元联邦资金的风险之际，索科洛夫为芝加哥大学布斯商学院提供了一条潜在的生命线。【原文：Private equity investor Konstantin Sokolov has donated $100 million to the University of Chicago Booth School of Business, giving it a potential lifeline at a time when elite US colleges risk losing billions of dollars in federal funding.】

item.title: 在特朗普削减资金之际，越来越多的美国人盯上了英国的工作机会
item.description: 在唐纳德-特朗普总统削减资金和经济前景暗淡的情况下，越来越多的美国人开始在英国寻找工作。【原文：Americans are increasingly looking for jobs in Britain amid President Donald Trump’s funding cuts and a darkening economic outlook.】

item.title: 预算削减后，特朗普技术助理呼吁 "创造性 "推动研发工作
item.description: 白宫科技主任迈克尔-克拉齐奥斯（Michael Kratsios）表示，随着特朗普政府大刀阔斧地削减研究机构的预算，美国将需要在公共研究经费方面做出 "明智的选择"，以便在人工智能等领域保持竞争力。【原文：White House science and technology director Michael Kratsios said the US will need to make “smart choices” with public research funding to stay competitive in areas like artificial intelligence as the Trump administration’s sweeping budget cuts spread to research organizations.】

item.title: 美国垃圾债券市场长期无交易后解冻
item.description: 随着信贷市场在关税引发的波动之后趋于稳定，美国垃圾债券市场重新开市，进行了近两周以来的首次发行。【原文：The US junk-bond market has reopened with its first offering in nearly two weeks as credit markets stabilize following tariff-induced volatility.】

item.title: S&P 500 指数上涨，交易员分析盈利和关税动态
item.description: 周二，美国股市在涨跌之间徘徊，投资者将持续的全球贸易战与华尔街银行发布的一系列利好财报进行了权衡。【原文：US equities flipped between gains and losses Tuesday as investors weighed the ongoing global trade war against a slew of positive earnings reports from Wall Street banks.】

item.title: 政策选择引发津巴布韦 ZiG 货币消亡风险
item.description: 据津巴布韦历史最悠久的独立经纪公司称，津巴布韦的金银支持货币正走向失败，因为政策失误将其推向了边缘。【原文：Zimbabwe’s bullion-backed currency is heading for failure because policy mistakes have pushed it to the sidelines, according to the country’s oldest independent brokerage.】

item.title: Webull创始人财富突破50亿美元，SPAC卷土重来
item.description: 一家以散户交易员爱好者而闻名的经纪公司的创始人，正从自己公司的 "备忘录股票 "时刻中获益。【原文：The founder of a brokerage known for its retail trader enthusiasts is benefiting from his company’s own meme stock moment.】

item.title: 国际货币基金组织支持改革后惠誉上调巴基斯坦评级
item.description: 惠誉国际评级公司（Fitch Ratings）上调了巴基斯坦的信用评级，理由是相信这个南亚国家能够根据国际货币基金组织的贷款计划持续进行改革。【原文：Fitch Ratings upgraded Pakistan’s credit rating, citing confidence that the South Asian country will be able to sustain reforms under a loan program with the International Monetary Fund.】

item.title: 在美交易的中国股票面临老对手：退市
item.description: 华盛顿和中国政府之间的贸易对决正在波及在美国上市的中国股票，分析师们正在为中国股票被赶出美国交易所的情景进行博弈。【原文：The trade showdown between Washington and Beijing is spilling over to Chinese stocks listed in the US, with analysts war-gaming a scenario where they’re booted off American exchanges.】

item.title: 毛里求斯修订后的财政缺口和债务显示预算缺口巨大
item.description: 毛里求斯新政府第二次修订了其对预算资金缺口的估计，使该比率接近最初估计的三倍。【原文：The new administration in Mauritius has revised its estimate of the budget-financing gap for a second time, sending the ratio close to three times the initial estimate.】

item.title: 尼日利亚通胀率上升，贸易动荡可能带来更多痛苦
item.description: 尼日利亚的年度通胀率自 1 月份重新调整数据以来首次上升，甚至在全球贸易战的影响尚未显现之前就已有所上升。【原文：Nigeria’s annual inflation rate rose for the first time since the data was rebased in January, advancing even before the fallout from a global trade war is felt.】

item.title: 加拿大通胀率意外降至 2.3%，债券反弹
item.description: 由于汽油和旅行团价格下降，加拿大消费价格意外降温，机票价格因乘客避免前往美国而大幅下跌。【原文：Canadian consumer prices unexpectedly cooled as prices fell for gasoline and travel tours, with airfares plunging as passengers avoided trips to the US.】

item.title: 加密货币的最新稳定币是与通胀挂钩的债券替代品
item.description: 一种新的加密货币旨在占领投资者安全的最后前沿— 不会因通货膨胀而失去购买力的现金。【原文：A new cryptocurrency aims to occupy the final frontier of investor safety — cash that doesn’t lose purchasing power to inflation.】

item.title: 受关税影响，纽约制造业收缩，前景黯淡
item.description: 4 月份，纽约州的工厂活动连续第二个月萎缩，而在特朗普政府推出大范围关税计划后，衡量近期商业环境前景的指标跌至 2001 年以来的最低水平。【原文：New York state factory activity contracted in April for a second month while a gauge of the near-term outlook for business conditions plunged to the lowest level since 2001 in the wake of the Trump administration’s extensive tariffs plan.】

item.title: 信心崩溃，美元与美国国债收益率的联系减弱
item.description: 美元与国债收益率之间的传统关系是三年来最弱的，因为投资者在紧张时期会重新考虑美国资产的安全性。【原文：The traditional relationship between the dollar and Treasury yields is the weakest in three years as investors rethink the safety of US assets in times of stress.】

item.title: 花旗交易员帮助弗雷泽接近盈利目标
item.description: 由于花旗集团的交易员业绩超出预期，且该行财富和零售业务的收入创下历史新高，该公司第一季度的盈利能力已接近关键目标。【原文：Citigroup Inc. inched closer to a key profitability target in the first quarter as the firm’s traders surpassed expectations and the bank drew a record haul from its wealth and retail businesses.】

item.title: 中国贸易繁荣的 "原点 "重新思考与美国脱钩问题
item.description: 在中国举行的全球最大贸易博览会上，高管们发现自己正目睹全球商业分崩离析的深渊。【原文：Executives at the world’s biggest trade fair in China found themselves staring into the abyss as the seams of global commerce come apart.】

item.title: 特朗普对华船舶收费将打击全球航运巨头
item.description: 集装箱船是全球贸易的主力军，运输着全球近 90% 的制成品，在唐纳德-特朗普与中国的冲突中成为众矢之的。【原文：Container ships, the workhorses of global trade transporting almost 90% of the world’s manufactured goods, have become a target in Donald Trump’s conflict with China — and none of the major carriers stand to escape the extra costs.】

item.title: 莫桑比克首都燃油泵干涸，美元赤字严重
item.description: 从空空如也的加油泵到街头高价出售的美元，莫桑比克的外币紧缩问题在这个天然气资源丰富的东南非国家日益明显。【原文：From empty fuel pumps to dollars selling for a steep premium on the street, Mozambique’s foreign-currency crunch is becoming increasingly obvious in the natural gas-rich southeast African nation.】

item.title: KKR 一周交易额达 80 亿美元，重启 Covid 时代的游戏规则
item.description: 美国总统唐纳德-特朗普（Donald Trump）的贸易战引发了市场动荡，私募股权公司 KKR & Co.在这一周内签署了价值至少 80 亿美元的收购协议，一扫全球交易的阴霾。【原文：Private equity firm KKR & Co. inked at least $8 billion worth of acquisitions in a week that’s been dominated by market turbulence triggered by President Donald Trump’s trade war, defying the gloom in dealmaking globally.】

item.description: 欢迎阅读《深度科技》（Tech In Depth），我们每天为您提供彭博社全球记者关于科技商业的报道和分析。今天，根岸真由美（Mayumi Negishi）将重访一位隐藏在众目睽睽之下的日本人工智能先驱。【原文：Welcome to Tech In Depth, our daily newsletter with reporting and analysis about the business of tech from Bloomberg’s journalists around the world. item.title: 美国铜业寻求出口限制而非进口关税
item.description: 美国铜业的主要企业呼吁唐纳德-特朗普总统限制矿石和废金属的出口，而不是对进口征收关税，以努力提高国内产量。【原文：Major players in the US copper industry have called on President Donald Trump to restrict exports of ore and scrap metal rather than imposing tariffs on imports, in his efforts to boost domestic production.】

item.title: 台积电、ASML 展望揭示关税之痛与人工智能回调的深层原因
item.description: 本周，两家芯片业巨头的财报将让人们对那些打击投资者信心、使估值跌至多年低点的问题有一个初步的了解。【原文：Earnings from two chip-industry giants this week are poised to provide an early insight into issues that have punctured investor confidence and sent valuations to multiyear lows.】
